dialogue: I've been asked to explain our disaster preparedness plan.
In the event of famine, turn your keyboard upside down and shake.
If it's anything like mine, you'll find a pound and a half of crumbs.
In the event of an alien invasion, your best bet is to kill a co-worker to show your allegiance to the lizard-people.
In the event of an impending collision with an asteroid, try running in place while the earth rotates.
If you time it right, you'll be on the other side of the planet when the asteroid hits.
To prepare for every other type of disaster, I recommend cultivating a taste for human flesh.
And next time you'll be prepared for it.
